lessons.pattern: write_file fails because file already exists
lessons.lesson: Use edit_file for modifying existing files (much more token-efficient). Only use write_file with overwrite=true when replacing the entire file.
Always use grep first to find the exact content before calling edit_file. The file content may differ from what you expect.

lessons.pattern: exec called 3+ times in a row with repeated failures
lessons.lesson: When exec fails twice, stop and reassess the approach instead of retrying the same thing. Read the error message carefully and try a different strategy.

lessons.pattern: web_fetch returned truncated content from a large page
lessons.lesson: For general research questions, prefer web_search (Sonar) which returns concise summarized answers. Only use web_fetch for specific documentation or API reference pages.
